text: In our 2017 report, FINTECH: Innovations You May Not Know were from Latin America and the Caribbean, we identified 703 Fintech startups in Latin America and the Caribbean.
Of the 703 identified startups in 2017, at least 85 have stopped their comercial activities.
In the 2018 edition report we identified 548 new Fintech startups, a 66% increase from 2017, with a total of 1.166 Fintech startups in the region.
The Fintech startups of the región are distributed along 11 business segments, with a majority in the payments and remittances and lending sectors.
Some startups are in the concept/idea or demo/prototype stage, but at least 37,3% of the startups are in the growth & expansion stage, 28% are ready to scale and 11% have just launched.
México, Brasil and Argentina concentrate most of the Fintech startups of the region.
